dataset_description.Name: Reward gain and punishment avoidance reversal learning

readme_content: Two reversal learning tasks with different reinforcer (monetary reward vs. primary threat reinforcer). Positive feedback in the reward task indicated monetary reward (+10 Cent) and negative feedback monetary non-reward (+0 Cent). In the punishment task, positive feedback signaled successful avoidance of a loud white noise burst and negative feedback the application of the noise burst. The white noise burst intensity was titrated to match monetary reward (+10 Cent) for every participant (81 dB, 84 dB, 87, dB, 90 dB).
